TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AttachableMemberIdentifier extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier>

Docs.summary: Provides a XAML type system identifier representation for attachable members. The identifier structure parallels the string form for attachable member usage.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type declaringType, string memberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The `declaringType` component of the identifier, which should match the name of the declaring <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The `memberName` component of the identifier, which should match the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the component value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DeclaringType value should match the name of the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the attachable member's XAML type system information.
